front.title: The Ogg Encapsulation Format Version 0
front.keyword: stream based storage of codec data
front.abstract: This document describes the Ogg bitstream format version 0, which is a general, freely-available encapsulation format for media streams. It is able to encapsulate any kind and number of video and audio encoding formats as well as other data streams in a single bitstream. This memo provides information for the Internet community. This memo provides information for the Internet community.
